attributes.action: Change the play tower at Corams field park
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to change the play tower at Corams Field Park back to how it was as it has become far too dangerous for our kids to play on due to the holes and how cramped the tower is; most kids cant get on on their own; leading to it being more cramped and accidents happening.
attributes.background: We want the large play tower to be changed back to how it was as it has become far too dangerous for our kids to play on.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. 

You may wish to take your concerns about this issue to your local council. You can find your local council here: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
